properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
SELECT M.USER_ID,USER_PWD,NICKNAME,STATUS,SKIN_ID,COIN,SELF_INFO,GENDER,ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER M, LOGIN_API A WHERE M.USER_ID = A.USER_ID AND API_KIND = ? AND API_KEY = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER( USER_ID, USER_PWD, NICKNAME) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO LOGIN_API(USER_ID, API_KIND, API_KEY) VALUES(?, ?, ?)
